name: Cult of Summoners: Big Boss
description:
Controls : W,A,S,D (or hold) to shoot: Arrows up, down, left, right to move.

Avoid being in the summoning door to summon the boss.

This is my weekly game jam 102 submission. For this theme I went for a top down shooter that has the same mechanics and similar design to the arcade game Journey to the Prairie King in Stardew Valley.  I learned lots for making this game, and I will be updating a new version of this game.
